story:
Pour consulter cette page en Français, cliquez ici.

Hi there!

We are Thomas and Julien, two cousins that come from very different backgrounds - marketing and technology - but that share the same passionate idea: to create the first visual and collaborative encyclopedia! 

This is big! This is why we need your support.

We have already developed a good part of the technology, amongst others a visual and interactive format which we called VISU©, foundation of the encyclopedia.


Navigate in a VISU©!


This campaign is being launched to help us deploy a first public version of Visupedia®, displaying all the created VISU©.

This is critically important for us as several investors are waiting for the first traction from the community to heavily invest in the next version of Visupedia®.

Thomas & Julien


Problems & Solutions

Visupedia® offers a totally new way to search and navigate the web and to understand any topic, thus creating a new kind of visual and interactive encyclopedia.

By interconnecting visuals, Visupedia® will allow people to easily find, understand and buy things among millions of items - even when they don't know their name or have a reference or even an image available.

So Visupedia® proposes an innovative solution to day-to-day problems:

How do you easily find and buy things, among millions of items, when you don't even know their name or have a reference?

Start your search using an item or product that is close to what your are looking for, navigate through visual categories and tagged images, find it and directly if necessary buy it directly.

What is the name of this small spare part of my bike that broke?

Try it out live!


How do you get to understand how to install, use, repair or maintain these things?

Clearly explain and learn about any kind of process by breaking it down into visual steps.

How can I replace this part? Where could I find a sort of IKEA manual to replace it?

Try it out live!


Business models

Visupedia®'s incomes are based on 2 complementary business models: 

B2B model - Visupedia® for business (MYVISU©)

Use of our technology and the VISU© format for professional purposes, embedded in any web media. This model is already active for paying customers. 

Live examples & more info on www.myvisu.com.

B2C model - Product placement

This is where YOU can earn money by contributing to the encyclopedia!

Highly qualified commercial products linked to the visual content will be strategically positioned for visitors that need to purchase the searched item, once found.

These products will be fetched from existing commercial catalogues. Such affiliate programs do pay out commissions to the lead generator. Visupedia® shares this revenue with the main contributor to thank you for the contributing.

Earn money by sharing your knowledge!


Competition

Of course, powerful solutions such as sophisticated search engines or visual recognition systems already exist.

However, those solutions always require the users to know the name or reference of what they are looking for, or eventually have its image so that they can try to have it automatically recognized.

Visupedia® side-steps the need to know the name or have an image. How cool is that?


Roadmap

2013 - VISU©:  Development of our universal visual & interactive format
Bringing our concept into life, we have created VISU©, a proprietary format that enables us to categorize, describe and explain any topic using tagged visuals. To ensure our format is universal, we have created 12 000 tagged visuals in very different domains. This format can then be embedded on any web media.
VISU© is the foundation of the encyclopedia.

See live examples!


2014 - MYVISU©:  Commercialization of our B2B product to paying customers

To further test our format, we launched VISU© for paying companies that needed to describe complex products or explain how and why to install, use and maintain them

2015Q2 - VISU© EDITOR:  Deployment of an online editor

We are launching a VISU© editor that allows anyone to create and publish VISU© for free. The editor will be used to create and publish VISU© within Visupedia® Alpha.

Try it now!

Or if you don't feel comfortable with technology but sill want to discover how easy it is to create a VISU©, go check out this short video.

2015Q3-Q4 - VISUPEDIA® ALPHA: First version of the encyclopedia

With your help, we would like to launch a first platform for the encyclopedia. Most of the features envisioned for the final platform will already be available. The main objective is to get one step closer to the encyclopedia as well as to demonstrate just how useful it can be.
This is why we need your help - help us to make it happen!

2016 - VISUPEDIA®: The visual & collaborative encyclopedia

We have received strong interests in the final project from business angels and Venture Capital firms. However they would like to see public traction from the B2C market. We have to launch Visupedia® Alpha to demonstrate this, and of course show your interest in the platform! 


What We Need & What You Get

We need $50 000 to cover the costs of our team and infrastructure. 

The activities we will undertake to deploy Visupedia® Alpha are:

  • Minor adjustments and further development of our technology
  • Connecting our system to commercial databases to offer the right products on the right page
  • Enhancement of our search engine to enable you to find what you are looking for throughout Visupedia® Alpha's content
  • Setting up a cool homepage with a feed of featured VISU©
  • A few new features to further enhance the format, such as including the possibility to tag 3D models
  • Import of the content of the encyclopedia we have already created
  • Import of some free visual databases to increase the content 

What you get for your help:

  • Our endless love! 
We will never forget the first people that helped Visupedia® become a reality. Backers will always be in our heart and will be the first to know about news and exclusive advantages.

  • Crowdfunder badge
Show that you were amongst the first to support Visupedia® on the website itself.

  • Early access to Visupedia® Alpha - from $20!
At the time of launch, we will restrict the ability to create VISU© within Visupedia® Alpha for 2 weeks. That way, you get the first choice of topics you would like to create and therefore be the first to earn money on these topics.

  • Be a Visupedian and sponsor a VISU©
Being the first to create a VISU© on a topic is great. Being the owner of a VISU© made by our experienced graphic designers is even better! Let us create a beautiful VISU© on your favorite topics and we will add your picture or company logo as its creator. Choose packages from 1 to 100 images that we will create for you.

  • Premium pledge
From $5 000, you become one of the gang. You get your portrait made by our graphic designers together with the first funders and we will involve you in the development and design of Visupedia® Alpha. It will all start with a lunch at the company offices with the 2 co-founders and will follow with regular updates and requests for your opinion throughout the development of Visupedia® Alpha.


Other Ways You Can Help

It is not all about money. We also need visibility! So go ahead and share this campaign on your social networks, tell your friends, co-workers and family about this great project.

You can also create a VISU© with our brand new editor on editor.myvisu.com and publish anywhere you want for free.


What if?

Yep, we opted for flex-funding. Deploying a first version of Visupedia® requires quite some efforts and the $50 000 won't cover all the costs anyway. We are dealing with other sources of fundings to help us out getting to this cool objective. 

Whatever happens we will deliver the VISU© ordered by our backers.


We already thank your for your help and support!




Version en Français

Bonjour à tous !

Nous sommes Julien et Thomas, deux cousins venant d’horizons très différents – Marketing & Technologie – mais qui partagent un même rêve : créer la première encyclopédie visuelle et collaborative! 

Ce n’est évidemment pas une mince affaire! C’est pour cela que nous avons besoin de votre aide précieuse.

A ce jour, nous avons déjà développé une bonne partie de la technologie du projet, dont un format visuel et interactif – qsurnommé VISU© - qui est la base de la future encyclopédie.


Naviguer dans un VISU©!


Cette campagne a pour objectif de nous aider à lancer une première version publique de Visupedia® permettant d’afficher tous les VISU© créés.

C’est un projet crucial pour nous, car plusieurs investisseurs attendent que nous leur prouvions l’intérêt d’une première communauté avant d’investir de manière conséquente dans la prochaine version de Visupedia®.

Thomas & Julien


Problèmes & Solutions

En connectant des visuels entre eux, Visupedia® proposera une toute nouvelle façon de trouver, de comprendre et d’acheter des objets parmi des millions d’articles, et ce, sans même connaître leur nom ou détenir leur image.

Ainsi, Visupedia® présentera une solution innovante pour répondre à des problèmes de la vie de tous les jours :

Comment trouver et acheter facilement des objets parmi des millions d’articles, sans même connaître leur nom ou détenir leur image?

Prenez comme point de départ de votre recherche un objet ou un article proche de celui que vous recherchez, naviguez à travers des catégories visuelles et des visuels tagués et trouvez ou achetez directement ce que vous recherchiez.

Quel est le nom de cette petite pièce défectueuse de mon vélo?

Naviguez dans ce VISU©


Comment installer, utiliser, entretenir et réparer ces objets facilement?

Expliquez et apprenez sans difficulté tout type de procédures en les découpant en explications visuelles « étape par étape ».

Comment remplacer cette pièce? Où trouver une explication aussi claire qu’un manuel IKEA?

Naviguez dans ce VISU©


Modèles d’affaires

Les revenus de Visupedia® se basent sur deux modèles d’affaires complémentaires.

Modèle B2B - Visupedia® pro (MYVISU©)

Il s’agit de l’utilisation professionnelle du format VISU©, intégré dans tout type de média en ligne. Ce modèle est déjà actif auprès de clients. 

Retrouvez des exemples et plus d’infos sur www.myvisu.com.

Modèle B2C – Placement de produits

C’est dans ce modèle que VOUS pourrez gagner de l’argent en contribuant au contenu de l’encyclopédie.

En effet, des produits commerciaux, liés de manière très sélective au contenu encyclopédique, seront affichés pour offrir des achats directs aux visiteurs.

Ces produits proviendront de bases de données commerciales existantes, dans le cadre de programmes d’affiliation rémunérant des commissions sur les ventes provenant des affiliés. Visupedia®, en tant qu’affilié principal, partagera ses revenus avec les contributeurs principaux, pour les récompenser de leurs contributions encyclopédiques.

Gagnez donc de l’argent en partageant vos connaissances!


Concurrence

Bien sûr, des solutions perfectionnées existent, tels que les moteurs de recherche ou les systèmes de reconnaissance visuelle.

Cependant, ces solutions nécessitent de connaître le nom ou la référence de ce qu’on recherche ou alors de disposer de l’objet (ou de son image) afin qu’il soit traité par les systèmes de reconnaissance visuelle.

Avec Visupedia®, plus besoin de connaître le nom ou d’avoir l’objet ou son image pour entamer des recherches. Cool, non?


Feuille de route

2013 - VISU©:  Développement de notre format visuel et interactif
Dans un premier temps, nous avons créé VISU©, notre format « propriétaire » qui permet de catégoriser, de décrire et d'expliquer tout type de sujets via des visuels tagués. Pour s’assurer de l’universalité de notre format, nous avons créé 12 000 visuels tagués, dans de nombreux domaines. Ce format peut être ensuite intégré dans tout type de médias en ligne.
VISU© est le format de base qui sera utilisé dans l’encyclopédie.

Voir des exemples de VISU©


2014 - MYVISU©:  Commercialisation de VISU© auprès de clients professionnels

Afin de tester davantage notre format, nous avons commencé à vendre la création de VISU© à des sociétés désireuses de décrire leurs produits complexes ou d’expliquer comment et pourquoi installer, utiliser ou entretenir ces produits.

2015Q2 - VISU© EDITOR:  Déploiement d’un éditeur de VISU© en ligne

Nous venons de lancer un éditeur de VISU© permettant, à tous, de créer et de publier gratuitement des VISU©. Cet éditeur sera utilisé pour créer et publier des VISU dans l’encyclopédie.

Testez-le!

Si vous n’êtes pas à l’aise avec les logiciels informatiques, mais que vous souhaitez constater à quel point il est facile de créer un VISU©, nous vous invitons à visionner cette courte vidéo.

2015Q3-Q4 - VISUPEDIA® ALPHA: La première version de Visupedia®

Grâce à vous, nous souhaiterions lancer une première version de l’encyclopédie comprenant la majorité des fonctionnalités de la plateforme finale de Visupedia®. L’objectif principal est de s’approcher de l’encyclopédie et de démontrer son utilité.
C’est pourquoi nous sollicitons votre précieuse aide!

2016 - VISUPEDIA®: L’encyclopédie visuelle et collaborative

Des « Business Angels » et des fonds d’investissements ont marqué un vif intérêt pour notre projet. Cependant, ceux-ci souhaitent que nous leur prouvions au préalable l’intérêt grandissant d’une première communauté d’utilisateurs pour notre solution. Visupedia® Alpha a donc pour objectif principal de démontrer cet intérêt!


Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous y gagnez

Nous avons besoin de $50 000 pour couvrir les coûts de notre équipe et de notre infrastructure IT.

Cela implique les développements suivants:

  • Des ajustements et des développements mineurs de notre technologie actuelle
  • Relier notre solution à des bases de données commerciales afin de proposer le bon produit, au bon endroit
  • L’amélioration de notre moteur de recherche afin de vous permettre de trouver ce que vous recherchez dans le contenu de Visupedia® Alpha
  • La création d’une superbe « homepage » affichant un flux d’une sélection de VISU©
  • Quelques nouveautés au format VISU©, dont la possibilité de taguer des objets 3D
  • L’import d’une partie du contenu visuel que nous avons déjà réalisé
  • L’import du contenu de bases de données visuelles gratuites, afin d'enrichir notre contenu

Et en échange, que recevez-vous?

  • Notre reconnaissance éternelle! 
Nous n’oublierons jamais les premiers soutiens qui nous auront aidés à faire de Visupedia® une réalité. Vous resterez toujours dans nos cœurs, vous serez les premiers à être informés de nos évolutions et bénéficierez d’avantages exclusifs.

  • Badge de crowdfunder
Affichez fièrement sur la plateforme que vous étiez parmi les premiers à soutenir Visupedia®

  • Accès en avant-première à Visupedia® Alpha - à partir de $20!
Au moment du lancement, vous disposerez de la plateforme Visupedia® Alpha deux semaines avant tout le monde. Cela signifie que vous bénéficierez de la primeur dans le choix des sujets pour créer des VISU©, et vous serez donc partie des premiers à être rémunérés.

  • Devenez un « Visupédien » en sponsorisant un VISU©
Etre le premier à créer un VISU© est un avantage. Etre le détenteur d’un VISU© créé professionnellement par notre graphiste est un GROS avantage. Commandez-nous un magnifique VISU© sur votre sujet de prédilection que nous signerons de votre photo de profile ou du logo de votre entreprise, stipulant que vous en êtes le créateur. Faites votre choix parmi nos packages allant d’1 à 100 images créées pour vous..

  • Contrepartie « Premium »
A partir de 5000$, vous faites en quelque sorte partie intégrante de Visupedia®. Vous avez votre portrait, réalisé par notre graphiste, affiché auprès des premiers fondateurs de Visupedia®. Vous êtes également impliqué dans le développement et le design de Visupedia® Alpha et nous vous invitons à notre siège pour un lunch (hors frais de transport) avec les deux co-fondateurs.


Autres façons de nous aider

Nous aider, cela ne signifie pas uniquement nous financer. Nous avons aussi besoin de visibilité ! Partagez donc abondamment cette campagne sur les réseaux sociaux et parlez-en, sans retenue, à vos amis, vos collègues et votre famille.

Vous avez également le loisir de créer et publier gratuitement un VISU© grâce à notre tout nouvel éditeur de VISU© disponible sur editor.myvisu.com.


Et si nous n’atteignons pas l’objectif de cette campagne?

Nous avons opté pour une formule de financement flexible. Lancer une première version de Visupedia nécessite de gros efforts que les 50 000$ ne suffiront pas à couvrir. Nous négocions donc parallèlement avec d’autres sources de financement pour pouvoir mener à bien notre projet.

Quoiqu’il advienne, nous réaliserons tous les VISU© commandés !


Nous vous remercions d'ores et déjà pour votre précieux soutien!

Nous venons de lancer un éditeur de VISU© permettant, à tous, de créer et de publier gratuitement des VISU©. Cet éditeur sera utilisé pour créer et publier des VISU dans l’encyclopédie.
Testez-le!
Si vous n’êtes pas à l’aise avec les logiciels informatiques, mais que vous souhaitez constater à quel point il est facile de créer un VISU©, nous vous invitons à visionner cette courte vidéo.

2015Q3-Q4 - VISUPEDIA® ALPHA: La première version de Visupedia®
Grâce à vous, nous souhaiterions lancer une première version de l’encyclopédie comprenant la majorité des fonctionnalités de la plateforme finale de Visupedia®. L’objectif principal est de s’approcher de l’encyclopédie et de démontrer son utilité.
C’est pourquoi nous sollicitons votre précieuse aide!


2016 - VISUPEDIA®: L’encyclopédie visuelle et collaborative
Des « Business Angels » et des fonds d’investissements ont marqué un vif intérêt pour notre projet. Cependant, ceux-ci souhaitent que nous leur prouvions au préalable l’intérêt grandissant d’une première communauté d’utilisateurs pour notre solution. Visupedia® Alpha a donc pour objectif principal de démontrer cet intérêt!


Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous y gagnez


Nous avons besoin de $50 000 pour couvrir les coûts de notre équipe et de notre infrastructure IT.
Cela implique les développements suivants:
 Des ajustements et des développements mineurs de notre technologie actuelle
Relier notre solution à des bases de données commerciales afin de proposer le bon produit, au bon endroit
L’amélioration de notre moteur de recherche afin de vous permettre de trouver ce que vous recherchez dans le contenu de Visupedia® Alpha
La création d’une superbe « homepage » affichant un flux d’une sélection de VISU©
Quelques nouveautés au format VISU©, dont la possibilité de taguer des objets 3D
L’import d’une partie du contenu visuel que nous avons déjà réalisé
L’import du contenu de bases de données visuelles gratuites, afin d'enrichir notre contenu



Et en échange, que recevez-vous?




Notre reconnaissance éternelle! 

Nous n’oublierons jamais les premiers soutiens qui nous auront aidés à faire de Visupedia® une réalité. Vous resterez toujours dans nos cœurs, vous serez les premiers à être informés de nos évolutions et bénéficierez d’avantages exclusifs.


Badge de crowdfunder

Affichez fièrement sur la plateforme que vous étiez parmi les premiers à soutenir Visupedia®

Accès en avant-première à Visupedia® Alpha - à partir de $20!

Au moment du lancement, vous disposerez de la plateforme Visupedia® Alpha deux semaines avant tout le monde. Cela signifie que vous bénéficierez de la primeur dans le choix des sujets pour créer des VISU©, et vous serez donc partie des premiers à être rémunérés.

Devenez un « Visupédien » en sponsorisant un VISU©

Etre le premier à créer un VISU© est un avantage. Etre le détenteur d’un VISU© créé professionnellement par notre graphiste est un GROS avantage. Commandez-nous un magnifique VISU© sur votre sujet de prédilection que nous signerons de votre photo de profile ou du logo de votre entreprise, stipulant que vous en êtes le créateur. Faites votre choix parmi nos packages allant d’1 à 100 images créées pour vous..

Contrepartie « Premium »

A partir de 5000$, vous faites en quelque sorte partie intégrante de Visupedia®. Vous avez votre portrait, réalisé par notre graphiste, affiché auprès des premiers fondateurs de Visupedia®. Vous êtes également impliqué dans le développement et le design de Visupedia® Alpha et nous vous invitons à notre siège pour un lunch (hors frais de transport) avec les deux co-fondateurs.



Autres façons de nous aider Nous aider, cela ne signifie pas uniquement nous financer. Nous avons aussi besoin de visibilité ! Partagez donc abondamment cette campagne sur les réseaux sociaux et parlez-en, sans retenue, à vos amis, vos collègues et votre famille.
Vous avez également le loisir de créer et publier gratuitement un VISU© grâce à notre tout nouvel éditeur de VISU© disponible sur editor.myvisu.com.


Et si nous n’atteignons pas l’objectif de cette campagne?
Nous avons opté pour une formule de financement flexible. Lancer une première version de Visupedia nécessite de gros efforts que les 50 000$ ne suffiront pas à couvrir. Nous négocions donc parallèlement avec d’autres sources de financement pour pouvoir mener à bien notre projet.
Quoiqu’il advienne, nous réaliserons tous les VISU© commandés !

Nous vous remercions d'ores et déjà pour votre précieux soutien!

story:
The Need For This Project

Simply put, we have found a way to help parents ensure that their kids are getting what they need throughout their K-16 education. Parents want this type of help and support; but can't always pay the premium prices charged for these services. Our solution is to provide quick, easy-to-understand chunks of instruction that allow parents to become their child's learning coach. You can access our test course below in the Risk & Challenges section.

Our Need

In order to focus on building an environment specific to parents we need:

  • Funds to hire graphic design support to improve learning experience and overall quality. 
  • Time to focus on this work without the distraction of other employment.
  • People who are interested in what we're doing and would like to become an affiliate. The new platform we are developing on allows for those enrolled in the course to make money by referring others. It would be wonderful if people who help us build were the first to benefit from that particular opportunity. You can access our new academy environment (where we are currently building) below in the Risk & Challenges section.
  • Help spreading the word that high-quality, low-cost solutions are available. Even if we don't get the entire amount, we are going to keep building. But with your help we can build faster and with more focus.

The Impact

According to the National Education Association, research has proven that children whose parents and guardians are consistently involved in their education:

  • Perform better on exams
  • Earn better grades overall
  • Pass classes and earn credits more consistently
  • Adapt and transition well to school environments
  • Tend to finish high school & study at the university level

    • Risks & Challenges

    The primary challenge has been doing this work alongside having a career/job. I recently transitioned to contract work (rather than employment) so I'd have the flexibility to focus on this work. 

    I need to contract a graphic designer to improve visual appeal and product quality. Also using a different development solution for better video quality. 

    I need to work with a marketing professional to ensure sales. A test course was developed and made available last year and the results were amazing. With minimal effort, over 700 people responded nearly immediately. NOTE: Several people were allowed to enroll in the course for free. But parents said the course was definitely worth $24. Please feel free to Visit Test Course or Visit Our New Camp/Academy Environment

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Help us spread the word. We'd love to partner with other organizations doing this same type of work.

story:
At Science Connected, we work with scientists and educators to provide children with the scientific knowledge that will help employ them and help them become the citizens, leaders, and innovators of tomorrow. But that’s not all. We also work with researchers, journalists, universities, and industry leaders to provide cutting-edge research findings to people of all ages who continue to change our world for the better.

Together, we are transforming science education. Your support has the potential to change hundreds of thousands of lives by nurturing the inner scientist in people of all ages.

Our passions include:

  • Expanding scientific knowledge locally and globally
  • Providing public access to scientific research findings
  • Translating complex research findings into accessible insights on science, nature, and technology
  • Supporting scientific research, communication, and lifelong learning

Please join us in creating equal access to science education.

Image by GotScience contributor Emily Willoughby

Who we are

Science Connected is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit publisher of science nonfiction for a general audience and resources for science teachers. This organization was created by Kate Stone as an answer to a question: if science is for everyone, why do so many factors make it inaccessible? From paywalls to jargon, barriers to science keep many keen learners from excelling in STEM fields. Meanwhile, researchers often struggle to reach wider audiences. Science Connected bridges that knowledge gap.

Image by GotScience contributor Steven Spence

What we do

Science Connected expands accessibility of scientific research. Our largest ongoing project is our online magazine, GotScience, which exists to make science accessible to everyone. Whether or not you’re a member of an institute doesn’t matter—if you have an interest in the sciences and an internet connection, GotScience allows you to learn about the latest scientific research and applications. Our material is accessible in that it is available online for free, and is easy for the general public to understand. This publication aims to expand the science community beyond its traditional boundaries. Meet the GotScience contributors here to learn about our multinational team of highly skilled journalists and photographers.

We are proud to share with you some of our other projects:

Enhance the classroom. In 2016, we distributed classroom discussion guides for high school and middle school to 250 teachers and will soon be partnering with a local group to develop a science-oriented after-school learning program. Science literacy can be fun and interactive, and we want students and teachers alike to enjoy learning about science.

Train science writers. We have trained a dedicated volunteer group of journalists to report on astronomy, biology, chemistry, paleontology, physics, and more for our online publication GotScience Magazine. Our writers review books, interview researchers and labs, and occasionally report on their own projects. About 75 percent of the research reported by GotScience is not otherwise available to the general public. Most academic papers are still tucked away in journals behind expensive paywalls.

Promote and facilitate citizen science. As members of the Citizen Science Association, we support and report on efforts to conserve, create, question, and contribute to scientific research. We build bridges between people and science.

Collaborate between disciplines. We work closely with researchers to faithfully represent their projects and findings to the public. By forming relationships with science organizations, both large and small, we can share news about scientific discoveries that comes directly from the source. Our publication also encourages exploring science through art; we regularly feature scientific illustrations and have covered relevant sculpture and photography.

Image by GotScience contributor Max Goldberg

How you can help us move forward

We want to do even more. We need $5,000 to move to the next phase of freely accessible science distribution. Here's what we plan to do with those funds:

Community partnerships. Science isn’t just for schools or researchers—it’s for everyone. That’s why we want to be able to work with citizen science groups, social and political organizations, and any other interested community members to create accessible STEM literacy programs and events.

Expanded publishing. As well as bringing more STEM programs to our local communities, we want to make sure that our resources are available globally. A greater budget would allow a better platform for our online magazine, increased staff capacity, and an improved ability to print and distribute our teacher resources.

More science. With the ability to join professional organizations, subscribe to journals, attend conferences, and otherwise increase our own access to research, we will be better able to provide our readers with original, well-written information from a wider variety of sources.

Just $5,000 will help us make scientific reporting and STEM literacy tools more widely available to everyone, everywhere. Visit our Guidestar profile for more information on how we've used donations in the past. 

Other ways you can help

If you're interested in other ways to support Science Connected, here is how you can help:

  • Share this campaign and connect with us on Facebook, Twitter, or Google+.
  • Sign up for our mailing list.
  • Consider volunteering. Contact us for more information.

Together, we can make science accessible to everyone, everywhere.

Together, we can make science accessible to everyone, everywhere.

story:
Short Summary

This in-depth, historical documentary will discuss and highlight the contrasting difference between the historical Calendar observed during Biblical times and the Calendar observed today.

It will document the changes to the Biblical Calendar; who changed it; when did it change; and why. It clarifies the misconceptions on the exact days of the death, burial, resurrection of Messiah, and how it completely fulfilled the sacrificial requirements mandated in the Torah (The Law).

Understanding Heaven's Time-Clock is paramount to unlocking many of the hidden keys within the prophetic books concerning the end-times, especially in the Book of Revelation. This documentary will bring complete clarity to what is referred to as the ‘Mark of the Beast,’ all while debunking the many myths surrounding it. Could it be that this marking is something other than a computer chip?

Light will be shed on the dangers of the mistranslation of vitally key Scriptures within the New Testament that caused the Church, as well as society, to erroneously worship on certain days while inadvertently ignoring others.

In our first documentary project, The Calendar Story: Understanding Heaven's Time-Clock, you will learn the intricacies of our Creator's reckoning of time, and how man has altered it over that last 1,700 years. It will teach you what He expects and when He expects it. It will connect those missing pieces in Scripture that's been mistranslated by many and are quite difficult to understand for most.

Could it be that we have misinterpreted important lessons from the Bible? And as a result, were the teachings of Messiah somehow been changed or edited incorrectly over the years?

My name is Osmundo, Co-Founder and President of TruthTable Ministries, and as a teacher and minister, myself, I want to share the disturbing truth that I've discovered by in-depth study of the Scriptures over the past 15 years. Our ministry has been zealous in sharing this information with those around us, yet, we know that the world needs to hear this, and as soon as possible.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We hope to raise at least $22,000. These funds will cover the cost of equipment, filming, editing, talent, settings, transportation, and all the hundreds of things needed to produce a well-made documentary. We have broken the listing of costs down and this is a fairly accurate amount.

The Perks: These various levels of support will show what we are able to share with you for each level.

Executive Producer’s Bundle: $4,000 or more

           + Logos Bible Software Starter Pack

           + History Bundle (Josephus, Philo, Eusebius, Tacitus, Pliny the Elder, Pliny the Younger)            

Co-Executive Producer’s Bundle: $2,000 or more

           + Bible Study Bundle (Tyndale’s New Testament, NIV/KJV/NASB/Amp Parallel Study Bible)

           + Sponsor's Bundle                 

Sponsors’ Bundle: $100 or more

           + Book: The Bible on English

           + Strong’s Exhaustive Concordance

           + Signed Hard Copy of Book: The Calendar Story

           + 100% Tax Deductible Letter (please see your tax professional for more information)

           + Listed on Website’s Sponsors’ Page (guaranteed traffic of at least 125 views/day)              

Partners’ Bundle: $50 or more

           + Hard Copy of Book: The Calendar Story

           + Listed as a Partner during End Credits of the Documentary

           + Digital Copy of Book: The Calendar Story (PDF)

Special Thanks Bundle: $10 or more

           + Digital Copy of Book: The Calendar Story (PDF)

           + Special Thanks During End Credits of the Documentary

We hope to make this a no-brainer for you. If we do not raise the minimum funds needed, we will return it all. If we do raise the amount we need, we proceed as promised. Nevertheless, whatever we raise, we will fulfill the promises to those who so generously supported us. As with all new ventures, it’s an act of faith.

 

The Impact

As you might guess, when we learned that the teachings of modern Christianity were not the same as what the original writers had instructed, we were shocked! After all, we were taught the same as you, all (or most of) our lives.

This documentary will shed light on these ancient secrets, and could very well bring life and excitement back into the Body of Messiah as it was in the days of old.

Just imagine what it would be like to have 3,000 people come into the knowledge of truth in one day? Yet, we see this take place in the Book of Acts.

This groundbreaking information will impact the homeschool community, public school systems, colleges and universities, seminary schools, the religious sect, and those who are interested in history and astronomy.

This revealing of the correct information will help the world understand the exact nature of a loving God, and those things that He expects us to do. Your assistance is needed for us to get this message out there, and this documentary is a way for us to do so.

In this fundraiser, we hope to raise the funds to complete the production of the documentary film entitled, “The Calendar Story: Understanding Heaven's Time-Clock”.

TruthTable Ministries, Inc. is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization dedication to Biblical research and investigative studies. For more information about our organization’s nonprofit status, please visit https://www.guidestar.org/profile?id=47-5480944

 

Risks 

We hope to make this a no-brainer for you. If we do not raise the minimum funds needed, we will return it all. If we do raise the amount we need, we proceed as promised. Nevertheless, whatever we raise, we will fulfill the promises to those who so generously supported us.

My experience in the film industry is not professional, but I know enough to have surrounded myself with the best technicians and directors I can find. I have made films and videos of this subject matter before, and we are ready for this project!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

While you may not be able to donate, if you believe in our vision of exposing the correct Scriptural information, maybe you will share this Indiegogo project with family and friends via word of mouth, email, and/or social media?

 

Join us

Please join us on this amazing venture as we take a journey through the last 4,000 years. I guarantee you that you will "learn the truth about what you think you already know!"

story: After making thousands of lessons both PDF and video via YouTube. We have assembled all the most commonly found problems in a Linear Algebra undergraduate course as detailed solution-lessons. The solutions are designed to be straight-forward, and written how one would want to solve on an exam to gain maximum points.
story_txt: After making thousands of lessons both PDF and video via YouTube. We have assembled all the most commonly found problems in a Linear Algebra undergraduate course as detailed solution-lessons. The solutions are designed to be straight-forward, and written how one would want to solve on an exam to gain maximum points.

story:
What would the world look like if education was within the reach of those less fortunate?

If you take a regular stroll around your neighbourhood and keenly observe all those around you, you’ll realize that we are surrounded by so much ingenuity. Sadly, however, this genius stays undiscovered in most people due to lack of educational resources and their costly nature.

Statistics given by the U.S. Department of Education and the National Institute of Literacy suggest that 32 million adults in the U.S. can’t read. According to Huffington post, that’s 14 percent of the population. 21 percent of adults in the U.S. read below a 5th grade level, and 19 percent of high school graduates can’t read. The current literacy rate isn’t any better than it was 10 years ago. According to the National Assessment of Adult Literacy (completed most recently in 2003, and before that, in 1992), 14 percent of adult Americans demonstrated a “below basic” literacy level in 2003, and 29 percent exhibited a “basic” reading level.

The situation, although depressing, isn’t hopeless. Thanks to individuals such as Yuriy Seretskiy who are willing to devote their life for funding the education of those who don’t have an access to education.

His aim is to see free, or government-subsidized higher education. However, since an application for such an arrangement is difficult to launch without considerable delays, this campaign has been established to fulfil the ambitions of Yuriy and provide finance for students who might otherwise miss out of the opportunity of education. And he requires your help to make this possible! Your funds will be used for the following:

  • Fund at least 100 individual student scholarships
  • Provide students with upkeep funds for their day-to-day living for the duration of their study.

Even though your funds are for an excellent humanitarian cause, however, we won’t let you by empty handed. There are specific perks with specific amounts making this campaign a win win situation for whoever is linked with it!

The Perks are as follows:

  • For $25  USD
  • The first 25 000 people who support this campaign will get 50% discount on $50 perk.
  • World Record Participation: Are you a fan of Anastasia Kvitko? Do you want to be part of a world record? Millions of people will see your picture, this is a unique, once in a lifetime chance to be part of a crazy world record, and the bigger we go the tougher it is for someone to beat it!
  • For $50  USD
  • For any fan of Anastasia having exclusive content, photos and video is priceless. A closed group with limited VIP access only will be created where this exclusive information will be accessible. With photos, videos, competitions and opportunities to meet this superstar access to the Facebook group is well worth $50.
  • For $10000  USD
  • The Ultra Perk costs $10,000. For $10K you will be entered into the world record mosaic and you will get access to the closed face book group but your $10,000 also buys you a ticket to a closed after party celebrating the success of this campaign. Anastasia and many other special guests will be in attendance and this will be the best party of 2017.

Please fund our campaign for a small chunk of your fortune can lead to the discovery of a cure for cancer by some genius who, as yet, doesn’t have access to quality education. 

Thank you!

Background

Yuriy Seretskiy was born in the former Soviet Union into a family of doctors. He grew up fully understanding of the value of education. He knows why it is so important for a person to have the best education possible regardless of personal, political or financial circumstances. Yuriy understands and believes that education is the foundation stone for future successful lives. From a young age, his dream has always been to help hundreds of students to go to college and study. He dreams of seeing others harness their skills and talents and put them to work. He is not afraid to say that he believes these students have the potential to win a Nobel Prize, solve world hunger or even find a lasting cure for cancer or maybe AIDS in the not-so-distant future. It is all possible when the right people are given the right education with no boundaries.

When Yuriy ran for US Congress in 2016, he ran to make his dream a reality. He wanted and still wants to see free or government-subsidized higher education. Action will always speak louder than words and the fact that everything he does is in order to improve this country exemplifies this. This campaign has been established to fulfil the ambitions of Yuriy and provide finance for students who might otherwise miss out of the opportunity of education.

Every day new talent is discovered and uncovered. Bright sparks and future superstars are regularly emerging at all levels of society with uncanny professionals drawing the public’s attention to the achievements or potential. While thousands of talented individuals shine, each day there is an equal or greater number that are never noticed. These one of a kind, unique and hidden talents go unnoticed, untapped and untrained leaving the world poorer. The lucky ones are found they get given a chance but for many there is little or no hope of this. The talent is walking among us, frustrated and confused dreaming, wishing that somehow they could be seen or get to a place of education where they can show off their ability.

We are trying to find creative ways to make this funding come to life. Your participation will enable us to accomplish the following:

  • Fund at least 100 individual student scholarships
  • Provide students with upkeep funds for their day-to-day living for the duration of their study.

What would the world look like if education was within the reach of those less fortunate?

50% to start the ball rolling

To grab your attention the first 25 000 people who support this campaign will get 50% discount on the perks.  This means the $50 incentive will be $25  (limited to 25 000 people) and the crazy $10,000 will be $5,000 (limited to 1000 people)

Now we have your attention read on

The Goal

The goal of this campaign is to provide scholarships to those in need of funding for their tuition and a target of $2.75 million has been set to achieve this. Candidates will be selected based in strict criteria with their financial circumstances being at the top of the list. Very often, the brightest stars miss out on education because of nothing more than the fact they lack the finances, this campaign aims to end that for many people. 

Imagine how much better our country would be with thousands of these neglected individuals being refined, trained and eventually released into society after they have been through quality education. Consider the levels of advancement it will bring to many facets of society. Potential professionals and stars are all their, hiding among us, sat next to us on the bus or walking with us on the sidewalk. Imagine if this talent could be found and given the opportunity to excel. This is what the scholarships provided through this campaign are set to do: find, refine and release.

We need every concerned person to contribute his or her quota for this campaign to succeed. Your participation will play its part in providing those we support with the tuition assistance they need for a better tomorrow. Funds raised will go directly towards providing these scholarship opportunities, with strict accounting and transparent reporting. The automatic 10% of funds raised as a fee has been accounted for. Yuriy has started the ball rolling with a personal investment of $200,000 to purchase the two prizes that make this campaign unique.

This campaign is not a short term, flash in the pan campaign. Education is a long-term investment and those who are supported will be supported by your donation for up to 10 years. Through this campaign, you are changing lives who will change further lives and make a dramatic difference to the future of many people.

The Scholarships

The funding will be used to provide 10 equally awarded scholarships to ten Long Beach Unified School District students each year for ten consecutive years to the value of $25,000 each. Each candidate must meet certain criteria and each scholarship will be fully accounted for. The scholarship aims to provide finance to cover the cost of study and some out of pocket expenses for each student. With a purpose of reducing the burden, pressure and worry the scholarship will allow students to study rather than find ways to pay their way. This will mean that students have a better chance of getting higher grades or achieving more from their studies.

Meet Yuriy Seretskiy

When Yuriy Seretskiy came to America more than twenty years ago, he was a student with very few prospects and little chance of success. He was a hard worker and was intent on making a difference, making something of himself and bringing change to his life and the lives of others. He ran himself ragged between his career and his education, knowing that if he applied himself, the results would come in time. His effort paid off, and he saw significant returns on his time and energy that made him who he is today.

Today, Yuriy is an accomplished entrepreneur and a devoted philanthropist. He dedicates his personal resources to improve the lives others and make the world a better place.

What drives Yuriy?

Nelson Mandela said “Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world” and Yuriy believes in the same philosophy. He has listened to the wise, learnt what it takes to succeed, and has invested much of his life to deliver education to the people who need it most.

According to the words of Maya Angelou, “I did then what I knew how to do. Now that I know better, I do better”.  Everything that Yuriy does, Yuriy does in order to improve his country. He ran for congress on a platform of affordable education, and he was the only candidate to take a polygraph test, indicating just how honest he really is.

When asked, “Would you give your life to effect positive change in this country?” Yuriy unflinchingly answered a bold and triumphant “Yes!” To create awareness of his passion Yuriy took part in a number of world record-breaking events all aimed at promoting education.

Meet Anastasia

Anastasia Kvitko is 22 and many consider her to be the Russian Kim Kardashian.  Anastasia is a model, famed for her unique 38-25-42 body and a social media icon with over 5 million followers on Instagram. She is a socialite and now lives in Los Angeles and is pursuing a modelling career. Anastasia’s tremendous following makes her an ideal ambassador for this campaign.

What we need to make this happen?

For those who lack funding the capacity to fund their education scholarships are of paramount importance. Kids who would otherwise not be able to pay for their education or who are wary of taking on high-interest loans will have the opportunity to apply for a life changing scholarship. All you need to do in order to get involved is share this campaign on Social Media and other ways. This is not a lottery or a sweepstakes: the prizes will be awarded based on actual activity.

To make this campaign a success two elements are required. Firstly, we need this campaign shared as much and as widely as possible. Secondly, we need to raise $2.75 million or more. With the incentives and prizes below, there is an incentive to share and a reason to donate.

What is in it for you?

Yuriy is all about giving back to others and this campaign is no different. This campaign is a win-win situation for everyone. We have you, our supporters, in mind at all times. This is an outline of the packages, prizes and incentives we have in store:

  • An Exclusive opportunity to feature in a world record picture mosaic.
  • Win a Porsche Boxster, a true road monster without paying but just sharing.
  • Invitation to closed Facebook group with exclusive content from Anastasia Kvitko

Ultimately, the winner is everyone as those who receive the scholarships will make a difference to society and with that we all benefit.

The Perks

The perks or incentives for this campaign are straightforward.

The first obvious perk is entry into the competition to win a Porsche Boxster simply by sharing this campaign

The second perk is the $25 perk. $25 will guarantee your participation in a world record attempt. Using Mazaika Software your image will form part of the bigger image of Anastasia; you can quite literally be part of her life. Check below for the Super Perk where $50 gets you into this world record and something extra and exclusive.

The $50 Super Perk with Exclusive Value

For $50 you will get your image used in the world record mosaic and have VIP access to a closed Facebook group that has exclusive and unique Anastasia content and more. For any fan of Anastasia this is a must have, private thoughts, unique photographs, chances to meet the model and access to exclusive competitions are priceless for real fans. This is your chance to get something priceless for just $50

The Ultra Perk

The most exciting campaign to support… it gets better for some!

This campaign really is the most exciting thing on the web and for those who are huge fans of Anastasia and those who really want make a difference in the lives of young untapped talent there is one Ultra Perk.

The Ultra Perk costs $10,000. For $10,000 you will be entered into the world record mosaic and you will get access to the closed face book group but your $10,000 also buys you a ticket to a closed after party celebrating the success of this campaign. Anastasia and many other special guests will be in attendance and this will be the best party of 2017 that you will not want to miss out on.

The Prize

The prize for the students who receive scholarships is success. The prize for sharing, just sharing, the most is a Porsche Boxster worth $100,000. Yuriy has invested $100,000 of his own money to make this possible and has purchased Porsche Boxster. It will go to the person who is the most active sharer of this campaign, if the campaign is fully funded.  

 

 

The World Record

Are you a fan of Anastasia Kvitko?  Do you want to be part of a world record?

Anastasia Kvitko is a top model and one of the most followed people on Social Media. She has over 5 million people following her on Instagram and you can join her in breaking the world record for the world’s largest mosaic made up of people’s pictures. For any fan of Anastasia, this is certainly something they would wish to be part of.  The current record is held by Queen Elizabeth II of England, and we want to break the record. Millions of people will see your picture, this is a unique, once in a lifetime chance to be part of a crazy world record, and the bigger we go the tougher it is for someone to beat it!

The Private Facebook Group

For any fan of Anastasia having exclusive content, photos and video is priceless. A closed group with limited VIP access only will be created where this exclusive information will be accessible. With photos, videos, competitions and opportunities to meet this superstar access to the Facebook group is well worth $50.

The Porsche Boxster

By far the biggest prize for any referral campaign on Indiegogo anywhere in the world. A $100,000 super car a Porsche Boxster would look great in anyone’s driveway. Yuriy has spent his own money to buy this prize for you.

In 2016, Porsche introduced the 718 Boxster, which features two horizontally-opposed flat-4 turbocharged engines. The manual, 2.5-liter version of the car is capable of hitting a top speed of 177 mph. This car could be yours simply by sharing this campaign.

How to Participate in a Referral Contest

 

When you refer your friends and help spread the word about a campaign, many campaign owners want to reward you with special offers and perks. That’s why you often see referral contests announced on campaign pages throughout Indiegogo. We want to make sure that your efforts are recognized whenever you participate and here’s what you need to do to make your action count:

How can I be sure that my referrals count?

Simply log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account by signing up here. Then, visit the campaign page on Indiegogo and look to the right of the main video for the "Link" button. 

Click the "Link" button. You will then see a popup with your unique link. Copy your unique share URL and use your unique URL to share the campaign on social media, email your friends and contacts, write a blog post, etc.

*This is an example. Here the URL shows a unique number ('12405055') on the end. This URL will be different for you, based on the campaign you are sharing, and your Unique ID will be different since it's your Unique ID.

Please Note: Due to Indiegogo's privacy policy, the campaigner will ONLY receive the name and email address of people who back their campaign. 

If you are not a backer, the campaign owner will not be able to get in touch with you should you win their referral contest.

You may want to consider backing their campaign before participating in a referral contest to ensure the campaigner will be able to contact you. 

How To Track Your Results

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  2. Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
  3. Select the “My Profile” option.
  4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
  5. Count the number of funders.

Note:

Referrals are not immediately reflected on your Indiegogo profile, but will be displayed within 24 hours.

Indiegogo is not able to track referrals made outside of this method. If you tell your friends by word of mouth or send a link without your unique referral ID, that share will NOT be counted in your referrals on Indiegogo. 

You can use your Indiegogo profile to track your referrals on each campaign you’ve shared. This makes it easy to participate in more than one referral contest at once!

 FAQs

What is this Campaign for?

This campaign has been established to create a pool of finance to provide educational scholarships for 10 people over 10 years. The funding is aimed at providing finance for talented individuals who lack the financial capacity to fund their education and release hidden talents.

How much funding is needed?

$2.75 million is required. $2.5 million will remain after Indiegogo fees have been paid.

What will the funding be used for?

10% of the funds raised will be paid to Indiegogo as a fee. The balance will be used to fund scholarships.

How will the money be spent?

This campaign has been established to provide scholarship to 10 students for at least 10 years. Scholarships will be awarded equally to ten Long Beach Unified School District students each year for ten consecutive years to the value of $25,000 each.  Yuriy has kicked off this campaign by investing $200,000 in prizes and incentives and we thank you in advance and on behalf of the future students for making this campaign a success.

Who is backing the campaign?

Yuriy Seretskiy is backing the campaign. Yuriy is an accomplished entrepreneur and philanthropist who ran for congress in 2016 on a Free Higher Education message.

What is in it for me?

The campaign is the first of its kind to offer a $100,000 Porsche Boxster as a prize just for sharing.  There are other perks starting at $25 with an ultra perk for $10,000

How do I support this campaign?

Anyone can support this campaign by sharing it on social media.  Investment in the campaign starts at $25 with an incentive to be part of record breaking attempt to create the world’s largest mosaic of Anastasia Kitko using images of people.

Other Ways You Can Help

We appreciate that some people cannot contribute financially. This does not mean they cannot help. If you love this idea but lack the resources to pledge to its success there are some other ways you can use to ensure this.

Spread the word and win!

Yuriy Seretskiy is planning to give away a $100 000 Porsche to the person who will share our campaign the most according to Indiegogo referral contest rules. All you have to do is share!

NB: We will only give it away if we raise the full amount of $2.75 Million

 

In Summary

Imagine how much better our country would be with thousands of these neglected individuals being refined, trained and eventually released into society after they have been through quality education. Consider the levels of advancement it will bring to many facets of society. Potential professionals and stars are all their, hiding among us, sat next to us on the bus or walking with us on the sidewalk. Imagine if this talent could be found and given the opportunity to excel. This is what the scholarships provided through this campaign are set to do: find, refine and release.

We need every concerned person to contribute his or her quota for this campaign to succeed. Your participation will play its part in providing those we support with the tuition assistance they need for a better tomorrow. Funds raised will go directly towards providing these scholarship opportunities, with strict accounting and transparent reporting. The automatic 10% of funds raised as a fee has been accounted for. Yuriy has started the ball rolling with a personal investment of $200,000 to purchase the two prizes that make this campaign unique.

Every referral makes a difference, and every referral improves your chances of winning a Porsche Boxster. It costs nothing to share this and we are looking to raise at least $2.75 Million to change the lives of others.

This is one of Yuriys big philanthropic events for 2017 and your support is welcomed. Raising $2.75 Million is not easy but with many people each playing a small part it is more than achievable. After fees paid to Indiegogo $2.5 million will remain and this money will be spent in education.

Please, use your social might! Tweet about us, like us on Facebook, or write a blog post!

Word of mouth publicity is also equally effective.

Just talking about and sharing the link with friends, family and co-workers will jumpstart this campaign and ensure its success.

Thank you

On behalf of Yuriy Seretskiy, Anastasia Kvitko and the students who will benefit from your kind support we say thank you. Without you this campaign cannot be a success and without you the students we help will never have the chance to shine.

This is your chance to get something priceless for just $50The Ultra PerkThe most exciting campaign to support… it gets better for some!This campaign really is the most exciting thing on the web and for those who are huge fans of Anastasia and those who really want make a difference in the lives of young untapped talent there is one Ultra Perk.The Ultra Perk costs $10,000. For $10,000 you will be entered into the world record mosaic and you will get access to the closed face book group but your $10,000 also buys you a ticket to a closed after party celebrating the success of this campaign. Anastasia and many other special guests will be in attendance and this will be the best party of 2017 that you will not want to miss out on.The PrizeThe prize for the students who receive scholarships is success. The prize for sharing, just sharing, the most is a Porsche Boxster worth $100,000. Yuriy has invested $100,000 of his own money to make this possible and has purchased Porsche Boxster. It will go to the person who is the most active sharer of this campaign, if the campaign is fully funded.    The World RecordAre you a fan of Anastasia Kvitko?  Do you want to be part of a world record?Anastasia Kvitko is a top model and one of the most followed people on Social Media. She has over 5 million people following her on Instagram and you can join her in breaking the world record for the world’s largest mosaic made up of people’s pictures. For any fan of Anastasia, this is certainly something they would wish to be part of.  The current record is held by Queen Elizabeth II of England, and we want to break the record. Millions of people will see your picture, this is a unique, once in a lifetime chance to be part of a crazy world record, and the bigger we go the tougher it is for someone to beat it!The Private Facebook GroupFor any fan of Anastasia having exclusive content, photos and video is priceless. A closed group with limited VIP access only will be created where this exclusive information will be accessible. With photos, videos, competitions and opportunities to meet this superstar access to the Facebook group is well worth $50.The Porsche BoxsterBy far the biggest prize for any referral campaign on Indiegogo anywhere in the world. A $100,000 super car a Porsche Boxster would look great in anyone’s driveway. Yuriy has spent his own money to buy this prize for you.In 2016, Porsche introduced the 718 Boxster, which features two horizontally-opposed flat-4 turbocharged engines. The manual, 2.5-liter version of the car is capable of hitting a top speed of 177 mph. This car could be yours simply by sharing this campaign.How to Participate in a Referral Contest When you refer your friends and help spread the word about a campaign, many campaign owners want to reward you with special offers and perks. That’s why you often see referral contests announced on campaign pages throughout Indiegogo. We want to make sure that your efforts are recognized whenever you participate and here’s what you need to do to make your action count:How can I be sure that my referrals count?Simply log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account by signing up here. Then, visit the campaign page on Indiegogo and look to the right of the main video for the "Link" button. Click the "Link" button. You will then see a popup with your unique link. Copy your unique share URL and use your unique URL to share the campaign on social media, email your friends and contacts, write a blog post, etc.*This is an example. Here the URL shows a unique number ('12405055') on the end. This URL will be different for you, based on the campaign you are sharing, and your Unique ID will be different since it's your Unique ID.Please Note: Due to Indiegogo's privacy policy, the campaigner will ONLY receive the name and email address of people who back their campaign. If you are not a backer, the campaign owner will not be able to get in touch with you should you win their referral contest.You may want to consider backing their campaign before participating in a referral contest to ensure the campaigner will be able to contact you. How To Track Your Results
Log into your Indiegogo account.
Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
Select the “My Profile” option.
Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
Count the number of funders.
Note:Referrals are not immediately reflected on your Indiegogo profile, but will be displayed within 24 hours.Indiegogo is not able to track referrals made outside of this method. If you tell your friends by word of mouth or send a link without your unique referral ID, that share will NOT be counted in your referrals on Indiegogo. You can use your Indiegogo profile to track your referrals on each campaign you’ve shared. This makes it easy to participate in more than one referral contest at once! FAQs
What is this Campaign for?This campaign has been established to create a pool of finance to provide educational scholarships for 10 people over 10 years. The funding is aimed at providing finance for talented individuals who lack the financial capacity to fund their education and release hidden talents.How much funding is needed?$2.75 million is required. $2.5 million will remain after Indiegogo fees have been paid.What will the funding be used for?10% of the funds raised will be paid to Indiegogo as a fee. The balance will be used to fund scholarships.How will the money be spent?This campaign has been established to provide scholarship to 10 students for at least 10 years. Scholarships will be awarded equally to ten Long Beach Unified School District students each year for ten consecutive years to the value of $25,000 each.  Yuriy has kicked off this campaign by investing $200,000 in prizes and incentives and we thank you in advance and on behalf of the future students for making this campaign a success.Who is backing the campaign?Yuriy Seretskiy is backing the campaign. Yuriy is an accomplished entrepreneur and philanthropist who ran for congress in 2016 on a Free Higher Education message.What is in it for me?The campaign is the first of its kind to offer a $100,000 Porsche Boxster as a prize just for sharing.  There are other perks starting at $25 with an ultra perk for $10,000How do I support this campaign?Anyone can support this campaign by sharing it on social media.  Investment in the campaign starts at $25 with an incentive to be part of record breaking attempt to create the world’s largest mosaic of Anastasia Kitko using images of people.Other Ways You Can HelpWe appreciate that some people cannot contribute financially. This does not mean they cannot help. If you love this idea but lack the resources to pledge to its success there are some other ways you can use to ensure this.Spread the word and win!Yuriy Seretskiy is planning to give away a $100 000 Porsche to the person who will share our campaign the most according to Indiegogo referral contest rules. All you have to do is share!NB: We will only give it away if we raise the full amount of $2.75 Million In SummaryImagine how much better our country would be with thousands of these neglected individuals being refined, trained and eventually released into society after they have been through quality education. Consider the levels of advancement it will bring to many facets of society. Potential professionals and stars are all their, hiding among us, sat next to us on the bus or walking with us on the sidewalk. Imagine if this talent could be found and given the opportunity to excel. This is what the scholarships provided through this campaign are set to do: find, refine and release.We need every concerned person to contribute his or her quota for this campaign to succeed. Your participation will play its part in providing those we support with the tuition assistance they need for a better tomorrow. Funds raised will go directly towards providing these scholarship opportunities, with strict accounting and transparent reporting. The automatic 10% of funds raised as a fee has been accounted for. Yuriy has started the ball rolling with a personal investment of $200,000 to purchase the two prizes that make this campaign unique. Every referral makes a difference, and every referral improves your chances of winning a Porsche Boxster. It costs nothing to share this and we are looking to raise at least $2.75 Million to change the lives of others.This is one of Yuriys big philanthropic events for 2017 and your support is welcomed. Raising $2.75 Million is not easy but with many people each playing a small part it is more than achievable. After fees paid to Indiegogo $2.5 million will remain and this money will be spent in education.Please, use your social might! Tweet about us, like us on Facebook, or write a blog post!Word of mouth publicity is also equally effective.Just talking about and sharing the link with friends, family and co-workers will jumpstart this campaign and ensure its success.Thank youOn behalf of Yuriy Seretskiy, Anastasia Kvitko and the students who will benefit from your kind support we say thank you. Without you this campaign cannot be a success and without you the students we help will never have the chance to shine.

story:
Short Summary

  • We are an organization which currently working on upgrowing art and urban culture in Ukraine.
  • Campaing based on collision of two ideas:

Our idea focusing on how to bring new life to the vacant industrial buildings by transforming it into a new urbanistic location for making quality present day culture product..
&
Lubomyr Melnyk idea of sharing and devolution his talent skills of Continuous Music Technique to people who really wants to learn probably the most unique piano music skills from Master personally and help him not be the one and last!

What We Need

  • We need funding for transformation old abandoned soviet boiler room in modern high-tech educational centre of Art: fully reconstruction of walls, floors and ceilings, providing sound isolation, heat isolation, etc

The Important things

  • One very important feature of this project is that Lubomyr offers a new relationship to the piano. He creates a "friendly" bond between the pianist and the piano, with music that is relaxing and joyous to play ! This friendly bond is both mental and physical; it is something new to the piano world, since both students and professionals are constantly tortured by worries over performing the correct notes "without mistakes". This stress and worry is totally lacking from Continuous Music.. Here, the player literallyplays with(!) his instrument, where the instrument becomes a source of joy and ease..

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you don't want or can't help us by funding just make some noise about our campaign by  Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Hi, we're Design Dance.

We’re an arts education company on a mission to build a stronger, more empathetic world through dance education.  Since our founding in 2008, we’ve reached thousands of Chicago kids, teaching courage, connection, and self-awareness through dance programs during the school day or after-school. Our community of forward-thinking parents and school leadership has grown to serve over 1300 students through over 100 classes per week.  We’re known for our innovative approach to non-traditional education experiences and are proud to have received the prestigious Creative Schools Grant for the past three consecutive years for our in-school residencies.

The Acceptance Tour

The Acceptance Tour is a Design Dance initiative aimed at bringing our empathy building Poetry in Motion program to kids in Chicago, Austin, and LA through a weekend arts experience for kids ages 9-17.  We’ll offer two days of programming for kids that will focus on the theme of self-acceptance.  Our team of professional poetry teachers, dancers, and yoga instructors will travel to community spaces to help kids develop habits that build self-acceptance and acceptance of others.  

Day 1: Family Yoga

Families enjoy snacks, drinks, and a yoga class! We'll stretch, balance, and relax as a community.

Day 2: Acceptance Day

A full day of workshops culminating in a community performance. Our day will begin with a discussion and exploration of qualities and intention setting, followed by yoga and meditation. Students will work with our Poetry instructor to create a written piece on the topic of Acceptance. After lunch, students will meet our Professional Dance Instructor who will teach choreographic foundations and then lead students through the process of turning their writing into an original dance. By focusing on self and group exploration, students will gain confidence, courage, and self-awareness leading up to their final performance for friends, family and the community.

Day 3: The Art of Self-Acceptance: How to Love Yourself While Growing Your Career

For the 21+ crowd! Join us for an intimate conversation about the delicate balance between self-acceptance and career growth, moderated by Design Dance Founder/Director Debra Giunta. We'll enjoy food and cocktails while sharing ways to better encourage a healthy self-image as changemakers and entrepreneurs in our local communities. 

What We Need & What You Get

We're working hard to put an amazing weekend together for our students and we need your support! Our goal is to raise $5,500 in the next 30 days in order to provide these weekends free of charge to our students. We’ll need to cover travel expenses, speakers, teachers, and supplies for up to 200 students. 

When you support the Design Dance Acceptance Tour, you are helping provide experiences for students that strengthen their confidence, encourages their creativity, and empowers their agency. In return, we also have some wonderful perks for you from custom thank you cards using photos taken from Acceptance Tour stops, Design Dance t-shirts, documentary credits, and even an opportunity for you to bring the Design Dance Acceptance Tour to your town next year!

Did you say Documentary?

Yes! During the Acceptance Tour 2017, we will be filming interviews with students, instructors, speakers, teachers, parents, and community partners, as well as integrate footage from workshops and performances, to create a mini-documentary unpacking what acceptance means for youth and what we can do as a community to create a healthy and supportive environment for them.

Why do we believe in Arts Education?

  • Students who study art are 4 times more likely to be recognized for academic achievement and 3 times more likely to be awarded for school attendance than students who do not.
  • The American public, by an overwhelming margin, believes the arts are vital to a well-rounded education; more than half rate the importance of arts education a “ten” on a scale of one to ten.
  • Anxiety disorders affect one in eight children. Anxiety disorders also often co-occur with other disorders such as depression, eating disorders, and attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD). Studies show that physical activity decreases anxiety, stress and teaches children healthy coping methods when they do face these struggles.
  • Recent dropout rates for American high schools are nearing 30% as schools struggle to engage students in curriculum. Involving students in their education by giving them creative autonomy prepares them to take ownership in other core subject areas, improving student desires to stay in school
 

Why do we believe in the Acceptance Tour?

  • The Acceptance Tour brings the benefits of arts education to students in major cities free of charge.
  • In addition to learning avenues for healthy self-expression, students improve literacy, reading comprehension, stress coping methods and other life skills vital to succeeding in their future endeavors.
  • Each student leaves the Acceptance Tour with improved team building skills and confidence as they collaborate to create original poems and dances to share with their families and school community.  

Other Ways You Can Help,

You can also help by sharing our campaign on social media! Let your community know about the work we're doing or even come out to one of our events! You can like us on Facebook, follow us on Instagram and Twitter,

Other Ways You Can Help,
You can also help by sharing our campaign on social media! Let your community know about the work we're doing or even come out to one of our events! You can like us on Facebook, follow us on Instagram and Twitter,

story:
Who We Are

The Sidney & Berne Davis Art Center is a visual and performing arts center located in the heart of Fort Myers. Our mission is to nurture innovation and excellence in the visual and performing arts through exhibitions, performances, education, and outreach.

Our historic building was originally built as the post office in 1933, and later converted to a federal courthouse in the 1960s, before being abandoned in 1998.

Since 2003, we have been working to restore the building and have just completed our upper floors, which include additional gallery space, offices, and classrooms for art and music education. Over $5 million has been endowed to this beautiful building to bring it back from ruin and register it as a landmark. 

 

Unfortunately, we still are not able to equip these spaces, which means our students have limited resources. With no dedicated, soundproof rooms, it is difficult for students and visiting artists to find a quiet place for lessons, rehearsals, and recording.

Our Wish 

We would like to create a suite of three STUDIOBRICKS Learning Studios in our east classroom. A defined, soundproof space is key to successful rehearsals and recordings. STUDIOBRICKS are a high-quality, self-assembly acoustic sound booth cabin system designed to be easily adaptable to any space and can be built in a short amount of time. 

Having proper soundproof space provides an ideal learning environment for students without distraction. We can maximize our use of space so multiple sessions can take place simultaneously. They would allow instructors to teach one student in the first booth, while another practices in the second one, and more advanced students are recording in the third studio.

The Learning Studios will provide our students with a unique, state-of-the-art environment and give them the opportunity to express their talents. These studios will properly equip our classrooms for new, enriching, and accessible arts education programs for children and adults alike. Arts and music education is a growing force in the Southwest Florida community.

Additionally, owning a STUDIOBRICKS system provides an added service to the Sidney & Berne Davis Art Center as a resource for visiting musicians and vocalists for warm-ups and rehearsals, as well as Southwest Florida residents looking for their own rehearsal space. 


The Plan

The more money we raise for our Learning Studios, the more we can fulfill our mission.

100% of the proceeds from this campaign will be donated toward the purchase of new STUDIOBRICKS Learning Studios and the renovation and completion of our upstairs classrooms.

By providing a place for new music creation, and excellence by giving the community a space to develop new talents, these studios will help us nurture arts innovation.

We can’t do this alone - We need your help! 

Donate today to make these Learning studios and education programs a reality! Help us create spaces where creativity and passion come alive!


The Perks

We will be offering perk options to the campaign as a way to give back to all of you who have supported and continue to support us during the growth of the Art Center.

Keepsake Light Sculpture Photo


Tuscan Level Membership to Sidney & Berne Davis Art Center

       More Membership options can be found on our website.


4 Hours of Studio Rehearsal Time

       Test out the STUDIOBRICKS soundproof booths yourself!


Miniature Light Sculpture 

                       

  

Sponsor a Historic Post Office Box

Help us spread the word!

Even if you're not in a position to contribute, you can still help us spread the word about our Eclectic Music Education fundraiser by sharing the info with your friends. Share this page with everyone around Southwest Florida.
